title: Whales
description: Whales is about the many different kinds of whales and the locations in which they are found during various times of the year. It also delves into the characteristics of whales and their behavior. Finally, it explains how Earth's whale population is threatened.
highFrequencyWords: baleen, blowhole, blubber, buoyant, decibel, extinction, narwhal, pods
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
phonics: Compound Words                : Recognize and form compound words
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
